items.title: Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell to meet with Deputy AG, Bondi says
items.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi has released a statement from Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche announcing he anticipates meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell...

items.title: 15 dead of malnutrition in Gaza in 24 hours, Hamas-run ministry says
items.description: Hospitals recorded the deaths, Gaza's Hamas-run Ministry of Health said Tuesday.

items.title: WATCH:  Badly wounded Ukrainian soldier perseveres with love of wife
items.description: A Ukrainian soldier lost his vision and needed three amputations after a Russian drone exploded right next to him last October.

items.title: American killed in Syria amid growing sectarian violence, State Department says
items.description: The U.S. State Department confirmed on Tuesday that a U.S. citizen was killed in Syria.

items.title: WATCH:  Spectacular powerboat crash off Monaco
items.description: Both pilots got out of their powerboats unharmed after a spectacular crash in E1 qualifying in Monaco.
